mapper.sql: supervisor_id, supervisor_name, supervisor_status, supervisor_institute, supervisor_image, supervisor_description, supervisor_email, supervisor_telephone, supervisor_school, supervisor_brief_intro, supervisor_achievement, project_id, log_id, supervisor_rank, is_deleted, start_time, end_time, update_time
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from PRO_SUPERVISOR
order by ${orderByClause}

select
from PRO_SUPERVISOR where supervisor_id = #{supervisorId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and is_deleted = 0

select
from PRO_SUPERVISOR where is_deleted = 0 and supervisor_name like concat('%',#{supervisorName},'%')

select ps.supervisor_id,ps.supervisor_institute, ps.supervisor_school, pp.project_id, pp.project_name, pp.project_status, pp.update_time from PRO_SUPERVISOR ps, PRO_PROJECT pp where ps.supervisor_id = pp.supervisor_id and pp.is_deleted = 0 and ps.supervisor_id = #{supervisorId}

select ps.supervisor_id, pl.log_id, pl.log_type, pl.log_supervisor_id, pl.log_supervisor_achievement, pl.start_time from PRO_SUPERVISOR ps, PRO_LOG pl where ps.supervisor_id = pl.log_supervisor_id and pl.is_deleted = 0 and ps.supervisor_id = #{supervisorId}
mapper.insert: insert into PRO_SUPERVISOR (supervisor_id, supervisor_name, supervisor_status, supervisor_institute, supervisor_image, supervisor_description, supervisor_email, supervisor_telephone, supervisor_school, supervisor_brief_intro, supervisor_achievement, project_id, log_id, supervisor_rank, is_deleted, start_time, end_time, update_time) values (#{supervisorId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{supervisorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{supervisorStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{supervisorInstitute,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{supervisorImage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{supervisorDescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{supervisorEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{supervisorTelephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{supervisorSchool,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{supervisorBriefIntro,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{supervisorAchievement,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{projectId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{logId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{supervisorRank,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isDeleted,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

supervisor_name,
supervisor_status,

supervisor_id = #{record.supervisorId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
supervisor_name = #{record.supervisorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
supervisor_status = #{record.supervisorStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

where supervisor_id = #{supervisorId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
